text:
League 1
Brest - PSG: Uncertain Lasne
Paul Lasne, the midfielder of the 30-year-old Stade Brest, is uncertain about PSG's reception this Saturday due to a thigh injury.
06 Nov 2019, 15:01 by Mourad Bennis



Alfred GomisDijonIcon Sport



Youcef AtalOGC NiceIcon Sport



William SalibaASSEIcon Sport



Edson MexerBordeauxIcon Sport



Jordan AmaviOMIcon Sport



Didier NdongDijonIcon Sport



Baptiste SantamariaAngersIcon Sport



Gael KakutaAmiensIcon Sport



Ui-jo HwangBordeauxIcon Sport



Memphis DepayOLIcon Sport



Denis BouangaASSEIcon Sport



St√©phane JobardDijonIcon Sport

Bouanga, Depay, Amavi ... the typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1




Brest could suffer a significant loss just before a gala match against Paris, as part of the 13th day of Ligue 1. Paul Lasne, the former player of the MHSC, would not be able to play against the club of the capital. because of a thigh injury.




Lasne could miss PSG




Paul Lasne and Gelson Martin + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Stade Brestois should do without the contribution of midfielder Paul Lasne for the reception of PSG. According to the Telegram, he did not participate in the collective training yesterday morning. His participation is therefore greatly compromised. Brest is 9th in Ligue 1 after 12 days (17 points).
¬†Paul Lasne: all information about the player
